name: Firewood Manor
description:
Firewood Manor A Maze Ablaze

Getting paid to house-sit a mansion is only a good idea if that mansion isn't haunted by arcane spirits.

In Firewood Manor you must navigate the mansion to find your way out before the fire finds you.

Drink Holy Water for visions of a way out

Avoid rooms that have caught fire

Find your way out

Brought to you by:

Fradiation Games (https://fradiation-games.itch.io/)

Rithm Gaming

Ludum Dare 42 Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/$11280812808
